name: ApocoCity (In Development)
description:
Short game for my entry to the Eclipse ORPG Game Competition (Click Here)

"So well done, you've managed to survive the apocalypse and u live in the only standing city. You're not safe yet, one city = mixed environment, you will have to battle some crazy mutants, robots and animals. There is safety, but who's gonna win this war while your sitting in an enclosed space? Get out of that little protected human community, Fight!"
